00063 class Application extends AbstractSingleton
00064 {
00065 //----------------------------------------------------------------- PUBLIC
00067         const SYSTEM_START_TIME = 'SYSTEM_START_TIME';
00068         
00070         const HOOK_SHUTDOWN = 'Application_Shutdown';
00071         
00073         const HOOK_START = 'Application_Start';
00074 
00075 //--------------------------------------------------------- Public Methods
00076         
00089     public static function GetInstance ( )
00090         {       
00091                 return parent::getThis( __CLASS__ );
00092         } //----- End of GetInstance
00093         
00103     public function GetConfiguration ( )
00104         {
00105                 return $this->configuration;
00106         } //----- End of GetConfiguration
00107         
00114     public function SetConfiguration ( Variables $configuration )
00115         {
00116                 if ( $configuration == NULL )
00117                 {
00118                         unset ( $this->configuration );
00119                         $this->configuration = new Variables( new BBDRecordSet() );
00120                 }
00121                 else
00122                 {
00123                         $this->configuration = $configuration;
00124                 }
00125         } //----- End of SetConfiguration
00126         
00127         
00139     public function Start ( )
00140         {
00141                 if ( $this->started )
00142                 {
00143                         $errors = new Errors ();
00144                         $errors->Add ( new ApplicationError ( ApplicationError::ALREADY_STARTED, 'Application has been already started.' ) );
00145                         
00146                         return $errors;
00147                 }
00148         
00149                 // get launchTime in microseconds
00150                 $this->systemVars[ self::SYSTEM_START_TIME ] = microtime ( true );
00151                 
00152                 // set up call back function for the end of the application
00153                 register_shutdown_function ( array(& $this,'onApplicationEnd'), $this->systemVars );
00154 
00155                 $var = array();
00156                 HooksManager::GetInstance()->Trigger( Application::HOOK_START, $var );
00157         } //----- End of Start
00158         
00166     public function OnApplicationEnd ( $params )
00167         {
00168                 $params = array( $params );
00169                 HooksManager::GetInstance()->Trigger( Application::HOOK_SHUTDOWN, $params );
00170         } //----- End of OnApplicationEnd
00171 
00172 //---------------------------------------------- Constructors - destructor
00176     protected function __construct()
00177     {
00178                 parent::__construct();
00179                 
00180                 $this->configuration = new Variables ( new BDDRecordSet() );
00181                 $this->started = false;
00182                 
00183                 $this->systemVars = array( );
00184                 
00185                 
00186     } //---- End of __construct
00187 
00188 
00193     public function __destruct ( )
00194     {
00195                 parent::__destruct();
00196     } //---- End of __destruct
